long_description: The DeadLock locks bikes to current Yakima hitch-mounted bike carriers. Includes a lockable cable for locking your bike directly to your bike carrier and a separate hitch bolt lock for locking the carrier to your vehicle. Both locks operate on the same key. Compatible with all Yakima hitch-mounted bike carriers produced since 2004.
short_description: The DeadLock locks bikes to current Yakima hitch-mounted bike carriers.
